misdeed: People are being found dead in the woods, their bodies ravaged and bearing strange bite marks, as if killed by a wild animal. However, the wounds seem almostâ€¦ human.
solution: The Vaesen is a Revenant and can be banished by finding its human remains, carrying them over a graveyard wall, and burying them in consecrated ground with a cross on the casket.

clues.description: The attacks always occur at night, and witnesses describe seeing a shadowy figure with glowing eyes lurking near the crime scenes.
Locals whisper of a hermit who lived in the woods many years ago, meeting a violent end. They say his spirit still haunts the area, seeking revenge.
The air grows noticeably colder near the sites of the attacks, as if an unnatural chill emanates from the ground itself.
Footprints discovered near the bodies seem to appear and disappear at random, as if the creature that made them can shift in and out of existence.
A tattered piece of clothing, identified as belonging to the long-dead hermit, is found snagged on a branch near one of the crime scenes.
Those who venture into the woods at night report hearing whispers carried on the wind, muttering threats and curses in a language they don't recognize.

plotTwist.description: The village outcast, seeking solace and acceptance in the wilderness, has unwittingly formed a bond with the Vaesen, offering it food and companionship.
